item.tib: chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
item.skttrans: sarba d+harma mahA san ti bo de tsi ta ku la ya rA dza
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po// lta ba namkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud//namkha'i snying po mchogi don// gsang ba mchogi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge mgon po dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmA a ti mahA/ bo d+hi tsi ta su tra
item.coloph: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de dag thaMd// ston pa kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar// rab tu shin tu mdun pa'i sgo nas 'khod de// thaMd mgrin gcig pa'i sgo nas zhus pa// ston pa kun tu bzang pos ni// chos rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' des// don de rtsa ba gcig tu bstan// rtsa ba gcig gi don bstan pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba rtogs// zhes zhuso// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des// chos thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa'i mdo dang// 'grel pa 'digsungso// chos kun rtsa ba gcig pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid sems nyid gcig tu bstan pa la// grangs dang rnam pa yongs kyis bgrang du med// ma bcos rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ti bya namkha'i lam la mkhas pa bzhin// mi rtog namkha' lta bur gnas par bya// rgyu rkyen ma byung rkyen med ma skyes pa'i// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po byang chub la// yod pa'i sgros dang med pa'i skur pa dang// yin min sgro skur btags pa ga la yod// ces gsungso// ces byang chub kyi sems kyi mdo dang 'grel pa rdzogso
khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo rdzogs+ho

item.tib: la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos// blo thag gcad cing bstan pa gtad pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin spros pa ni// byang chub sems ni blo yis bsams pa men// bsams shing brtags pa'i chos ni rigs byed ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes rang shar de la med pa na// blo yis bsams shing bsgoms pa'i chos la re ma 'jog/ chos rnams kun gyi thag ni byang chub semsu gcad// ma bltas ma bsgoms bsams pa med pas thag chod na// de la rang byung ye shes shar bas /thag der gcad// chos sku d+migsumed par sems dpas blo thag chod// 'dod yon longs sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// phan sems sprul sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// snang ba rang sems yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// sems la gnyisu med pas bag chags sbyang du med// yul med rang gsal yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// thig le nyag gcig sems kyi rang bzhin yin mod kyang// nyag gcig cir yang 'byung bas spong dang sgrub ma byed// kun kyang yon tan mnyam pas sems dpas blo thag chod// da ltar snang ba'i rgyu lus 'di kun sems dpas ji ltar dgongs// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul tsam du sems dpas dgongs mdzod la// sems ni bla med namkha' lta bu blo thag chod// kye sems dpa' chen po da dgongs shig/ rtsa rgyud le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes tshig tu bstan pa'i mdo lung yin// sems las rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ phyi ma le'u bcu dang gnyisu gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes bsams pas btags pa yin// da yang rang byung gcig tu sems dpas la zlos gcig/ phyi ma'i phyi ma le'u bcu dang lnga ru gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes rnal 'byor 'jog pa yin// sems dpa' rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ thos pas ston pa'i lde mig dang// bsam pas grol ba'i lde mig dang// bsgoms pas 'byin pa'i lde mig gis// nges par gtan la phab pa na// sems dpas legs par thag chod cig/ sems dpa' chen po da dgongs cig/ la zlos gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'khor ba'i srog gcod 'di/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la 'di gtado// blo ldan skal ba can la 'di gsungs shig/ dam med gsong sdom chu skyur gdungs pa dang// srin po rakSha 'dre brdung mthu ngom dang// rtag tu grong kha yug pa'i glang rgan la// rdzogs ldan 'di 'dra'i dgongs pa mi bstan to// rgyud chen la zlos gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// dgongs pa klong nas shar ba'i mun sel rdzogs so// //'di thos sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// 'di bsgom sangs rgyas dgongs pa thob// 'di bsgoms sangs rgyas dgongs pa gnas// e ma ho// bsam dgongs med par la zla ba'o// //ithi'//

item.tib: chos thaMd byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa namkha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harma mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa mU la tshed A kA sha sa ma na ak+Sha tan+t+ra
item.coloph: de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// cir snang de bzhin nyidu cig/ 'di la bcos slad ma byed cig/ ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de// mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs par gnas// skye med lta ba stong pa nyid// kun khyab sgom pa gnyisu med// 'khrul spyod sems kyi rgyan du rol// rtog pa'i 'bras bu thig ler gcig/ dus gsum gcig la khyad par med// gtan tshigs bzhi ru gcig pa'i phyir// nga la byung zhing nga ru thim// nga yi rang bzhin 'od gsalo// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje che// namkha'imtha' ltar longs spyod pas// chos dbyings skye ba zad mi shes// bdud rtsi'i thig pa lce la zhog/ rgyal po btson du gzung pa dang// /gangs rtse nas ni brnyil ba ste// shing rta'i gzer 'og gcad par bya// namkha' ltar yi ge med pa'i rgyud// rang rig sems kyi dkyil du chongs// thugs rje ye shes rol par 'char// e ma kun bzang rgyal ba yab// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs zab cing yangs// namkha'lta bu'i rgyud bstan pa// ming tshig yi ge med bstan la// bstan du 'ong ba ci yi phir// bcom ldan kun bzang bka' stsal pa// mtshon du med pa'i chos nyid la// mtshon du med pa'i tshig brjod nas// mtshon pa'i tshig las rnam par grol// legso seMda' rdo rje che// don dam yi ge med pa'i rgyud// khyod la gtado bde ba che// rang byung ye shes rgyas thob la// thig le nyag gcig ngang la zhog/ kun tu bzang po bde ba che// thig le chen po'i yi ge med// bya ba med pas rnam par grol// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang shar// kun rig sems la mngon par bstod// chos thaMd namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyogs pa med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmaH mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa muN+Da sa man+ta na bi la tan+t+ra
item.coloph: de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// e ma ho// sangs rgyas thaMd kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge med// rang bzhin 'od gsal yongsu dag/ namkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// bdud rtsi dri med rgyu ldan mtsho// namkha' la nyi shar 'od zer lnga/ dbus na namkha' bzhi yi mthong// gting ni rin chen bcud gsum gter// bde gshegs mi mchod rang sems mchod// rang sems sangs rgyas yin pa las// sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal te// rig pa rang grol bya btsal bral// rang snang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di// dper na rmi lam lta bu ste// rmi lam bde sdug sna tshogs yang// gnyid sad dus na chos kyi sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs bsgom// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o// namkha' lta bur sems 'gag pa// nyi tshe ba yi stong par lhung// mi gtsang keng rus la sogs bsgom// phyi yi sgrib pa can dang mtshungs// 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug sgom byed pa// skye mched bzhi las thar lam med// phung po gtan tshigs gzhigs nas bsgom// de ka rtog par shes par gyis// lha dang dkyil 'khor zhal phyag bsgom// med par sgro yis /btags pa yin// rtsa rlung thig ler bde ba 'dzin// ro myags mngal gyi srin bu mtshungs// skad cig snang srid lha ru gsal// 'di ni rtsol ba'i nad du 'gyur// zhi gnas 'thibs po bsgoms byed pa// ma he glang dang khyad par med// gsal ba phyi nang med par sems// rnam rig pas kyang shin tu gsog/ kun yin gang ma yin sogs pa// a tir khas 'che mu stegs chos// rdzogs chen ris med bya btsal bral// rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir// re shig rdzogs chen rol par mtshon// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste// slob dpon snying ston gdams ngag thob// mtshams med gsum gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// pha ma bsad pa'i 'bras bu gter// lta bas d+myal ba shin tu che// snang ba thams cad rdzun la ma khyer// ci spyod mo sham bu bzhin spyod// 'khor ba'i chos la chags pa skyed// bya lam khamsu gcig tu gdod// 'gro drug magtoD seMn gnyis// sprul sku d+myal ba'i gnasu 'gro/ gangga''i chu dang se na'i mtsho// khyod kyi rtag tu bsres la 'thung// yum gyi bha ga rtag tu ltos// btsun mo des kyang me long ston// ldem po dgongs pa ma go bar// sgra bzhin spyad na log pa'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpa' bo ce// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung dang// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'di las byung// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// rba rlabs med pa'i mnyam nyid mtsho// rnyog ma med pa'i dri med chu// gdod nas dag pa'i bdud rtsi 'dis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i dri ma khrus// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// chedu ston pa 'di brjodo// kun rig thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos// chos nyid byin rlabs rol pa yis// rnyogs med rgya mtsho'i klong ston pa// mnyam nyid rgya mtsho lta bu yis// kun tu bzang po mngon par bstod// chos thaMd rgya mtsho mtha' dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud las// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi khan po shrI sid+ha dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmAH mahA' san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la ts+tshe da sUrya tsan+d+ra sa ma ta a ma la tan+t+ra
item.coloph: de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// namkha' klong yangs gdal ba'i dbyings// ye shes nyi zla 'khor ba gcod// mdo rgyas lta bsgoms spyod 'bras dang// thugs rje'i chen po lhun gyis grub// rig pa mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// nyi zla lta bur dri ma med// sgron ma 'bar bas gti mug sel// drug gis 'gro drug g.yangs sa spyad// ston pa bstan pa gnas 'khor dus// rang snang sems la smras pa yin/ lta bsgom spyod 'bras bzhi yi rgyud// gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar bar bya// mkhA gsal nyi zla lta bu yis// don dam dri ma med pa'i rgyud// rgyud do cog gi rgyal po 'di// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad bstod// /mnyam nyid rgyal po lha yi lha// skye med rang byung chen po'i ngang// mkhA 'dra ye shes gdal ba'i klong// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yab// thaMd mkhyen pa phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dang// sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs pa rang snang rig pa'i 'khor thaMd dga' zhing mgu nas// rjesu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodo// chos thaMd rig pa nyi zla mtha' dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sid+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmAH mahaA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la ts+tshe da mahA rat+na sa man+ta a nud pa ton+t+ra
item.coloph: de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// e ma rdo rje sems dpa' che// rmad byung bcu gsum skyemedon// 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa'i chos// 'di ma shes pa ngal ba'i lam// 'di don rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang// gang ltar spyad kyang bde chen klong// rdzogs chen a ti bstan pa 'di// mi nub nub par mi 'gyuro// don la 'gyur ba med pa 'dir// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan rtse// rmad byung rin chen za ma tog/ don dam skye ba med pa'i rgyud// rigs lnga bde gshegs byang chub sems// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi lam// kun bzang thugs kyi bcud btigs pa// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// blo yi pad+mo kha phye la// snying gi dkyil du bsgom par gyis// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dang// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// mgon po tshogs dang bcas pa yis// ma skyes spros bral kun tu bzang// rin chen sgron mas gti mug sel// rmad byung rgyal ba kun gyi yab// rdo rje 'chang chen rigs lnga'i gtso// kun rigs rgyal po thaMd mkhyen// mnyam pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin nyid la rtag tu 'dud// ye shes rgyal por mngon par bstod// chos thams cad rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sid+ha dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po sa gcig pa
item.skttrans: san ti dar pa
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems rig pa khu byug rdzogs+ho

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems sgom pa don grub pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsi ta sa ma ti a mo g+ha tsa na nA ma
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa don drug pa rdzogso
rtsal chen sprugs pa rdzogs+ho

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems khyung chen
item.coloph: yul thams cad la 'jug pa'i bsam gtan du bya ba// rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying po// man ngag 'di rnams kyang sems chos nyidu gyur pa rnams kyi rna bar rgyud pa// khyung chen lding pardzogso

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa'i lta ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che
item.skttrans: Arya pad badzra sad twa
item.coloph: byang chub gyi sems mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan lta ba namkha' che rdzogs+ho// //rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che u rgyan gyi slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes dpal a su ra 'od ldan gyi brag phug tu gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho//

item.tib: bde 'jam
item.skttrans: many+dzu su kha
item.coloph: byang chub sems ni ye nas gsal ba'i phyir// klong gi dkyil 'khor chen po bde 'jam rdzogs+ho

item.tib: namkha' rgyal po
item.coloph: byang chub sems namkha'i rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: rje btsan dam pa
item.skttrans: tsa ra sha ar thA
item.coloph: lung dang man ngag gi don yi ge nyung yang// don rgya chen bsdus te// ma lus 'grel cing theg pa mtha' dag gi don bkod sa/ byang chub kyi sems bsam gtan nges pa'i rgyal po// rje btsan dam pardzogs+ho

item.tib: rtse mo byung rgyal
item.coloph: khyad pa 'phags pa'i bsod nams khri phrig yas// lta ba dgongs pa'i 'bras bu mthar phyin yang// lung dang man ngag nges don gsal bar bya// byang chub sems rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bya ba bsam gtan rdzogs so

item.tib: kun 'dus
item.skttrans: sarba a tha
item.coloph: thaMd 'dus te cir yang mi snang bas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de na gsal// byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus rdzogs so

item.tib: srog gi 'khor lo
item.skttrans: a yo tsakra
item.coloph: gnyis med man ngag srog gi 'khor lo zhes// thugs las phyung nas 'gro ba yongs la bsngo// srog gi 'khor lo rdzogs so

item.tib: bde ba 'phra bkod
item.skttrans: su kha pra ka te
item.coloph: byang chub sems bde ba phra bkod pa rdzogso

item.tib: rdzogs pa spyi gcod
item.coloph: rdzogs pa spyi gcod ces bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: khams gsum sgron ma
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems khams gsum sgron ma rdzogso

item.tib: skye med ti ka bzhugs
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba'i thig le ti ga rdzogso

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta mahA puSh+Ta tan+t+ra
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems thig pa ltar spyod// dam tshig tinge 'dzin rtsal sprugs pa'i rtsal chenrdzogso// //mtshan la rgya gar gyi skad smos pa/ bodu bsgyur ba/ byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud ces bya ste// spyir zhabsu bsgyuro// rgya gar gyi /mkhan po shri sid+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems khyung chen
item.coloph: rgyas pa chen po sha bu rgyas pa ma'i sgo bkag ste// rgyas pa bag yangs bde bar bzhag pa'i khyung chen gyi rgyud rgyas pa chen po'i mtha' rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sid+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che rgyas pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: de nas 'khor la gdam ngag du gnang ba// bsgom bsgrub kun dang bral ba yi// ting 'dzin 'dis ni btsal dang bral// dang po'i 'du ba chud ma zod// bar du bsam pa thag chod pa// tha mar sems chos shes pa ste// mi d+migs pa la gang gnas pa// de ni rtsal dang bral ba'o// bde bar gshegs pas gtad rgya dang bcas pa rdzogso// //bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa na dang/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar bhas sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: byang chub sems bsgom pa
item.skttrans: bi d+hi tsit+ta sa mA d+hi
item.coloph: sems bsgom rdo la gser zhun rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes bdun gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: b+ho d+hi tsit+ta mahA san+d+hi dz+nyA na tan tra
item.coloph: ye shes bdun 'byung ba'i rgyud sems kyi me long chen po rdzogso

item.tib: bkra shis pa'i dpal
item.skttrans: swa sti shrI
item.coloph: bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzogso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sid+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tshtsa ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA san+d+hi d+harmA tA bo d+hi tsit+ta swa sti bi lo gan+d+ho mo tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur ba gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud ces bya ba// sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po g.yu sgra snying pos bsgyur ba'i 'brel pa dang bcas par bshad pa'o

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: tan tra rA dza swa na ha sa da badzra da ri ha bi tan tra
item.coloph: rgyud gyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// rgyud gyi ma mo// sems phyogs kyi phyi mo// lta ba thams cad kyi phugs dgongs pa'i gdeng rdzogso// //sa ma ya so phag shi kha thams// nor 'dod bu pho dge slong bdag 'dra yis// rin chen sna lnga'i snying po gser khyer nas// rin chen srog la ma 'dzems dka' ba'i la rnams bsgal// nges pa'i snying po byang sems rgyud mad rtsa gnyis btsal// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bla ma dang// bdag 'dra bai ro tsa na yis// sgra skad bstun te chan la phab nas kyang// bod kyi yul du rmongs pa tshan gsum byung ba cha mchis nas// 'dir drangs mnga' bdag rgyal po nyid kyi phyag tu phul// rmongs pa tshan gsum dus na dar bar shog/ dang po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur// de nas lho brag nas khyung grags kyis gter nas gton pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra satwa sa ma ya /khe ma hA de ha puSh+TiM ga ra tan+t+ra
item.coloph: bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//

item.tib: bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u
item.skttrans: mahA su kha bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi kha
item.coloph: rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sid+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: shin tu brtag dka' ba'i don rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sid+ha dang/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha zer ba 'ang 'dug /bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: chos thams cad sems nyid ye shes kyi rgyal po dngos grub rang byung du spyod par dbang bskur ba
item.skttrans: sarba d+harma tsit+ta dz+nyA na ra dzA sing+ha bik+Sha tsa ra a bi Shiny+tsa a
item.coloph: chos rnams thaMd sems nyid ye shes kyi rgyal po// dngos grub rang byung du spyod par dbang bskur ba rna brgyud zam pa rdzogso

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ thig le rgya mtsho gnas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: mahA saM d+hi d+harma ta bo d+hi tsit+ta ban+tu sa mu dra s+tha a ba ta ra tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ thig le rgya mtsho gnas la 'jug pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyis mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ sgra sgyur gyi lots+tsha ba chen po g.yu sgras zhus cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: byang chub sems kyi man ngag rien phreng ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta u pa de sha rat+na mA le shrir b+ha ga wAn b+ha tra nA ma tra si ta la
item.coloph: lta ba thams cad kyi gnad/ man ngag thams cad kyi thems/ bstan pa'i thaMd kyi bcud phyung nas/ don man ngag du sdebs pa/ bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba/ gsang ba'i bdag pos/ rdoe sems dpa' la gdams pa'i rims pa bkod pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: man ngag thams cad kyi sdom
item.skttrans: u pa de sha sarba pu tra shrI ma hA su ka na ma su ti
item.coloph: lta ba thams cad kyi gnad man ngag thams cad kyi sdom pa/ tran tra thams cad kyis /bcud phyung nas/ don bsdus pa/ bang mdzod 'phrul gyis lde mig las/ gsang ba'i bdag pos/ sems dpa' rdo rje la gdam ngag rim par phogs pa rdzogso

item.tib: dpal kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po'i man ngag
item.skttrans: shrI sa man+ta b+ha dra su kha u pa de sha
item.coloph: yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lde mig las/ man ngag lus tshad kyis rgyud phyi mar byas pa'o/ /dgongs pa'i don mdor bsdus pa/ tshig le'ur byas pa rang snang gi ston pa kun tu bzang po la/ zer gyi bsdus pa po rdo rje seMda' yis man ngag gi don yang nas yang du zhus pa'i don/ yang 'byed 'phrul gyi lde mig zhes yang bya/ kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po'i man ngag zhes yang bya ba rdzogs so

item.tib: bang mdzod 'phrul gyi me long
item.coloph: bang mdzod 'phrul gyi me long rgyud phyi ma'i phyi mar byas par ma tshang ba kha bskang pardzogso// //'jam dpal gshes gnyen/ shrI sid+ha/ bai ro/ g.yu sgra/ dz+nyA na/ des sangs rgyas ye shes/ des bsgrags kyi yang rdzong du su la yang ma spel bar thugs dam de la mdzad do/ /tha mar mgar sreg la yang thugs ma ches par man ngag bzhag pa'i snod ma rnyed nas dar gyis dril/ tshigs su bcad pas sbas so// las 'phro can dang phrad par shog

item.tib: thag ring du 'gro ba namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: kha sa muny+tsa a ka kro ti ra tan+t+ra
item.coloph: de nas yang ston pa nyid snang ba thaMd namkha'i ri mo'i gzhal yas khang du bsdus nasbzhugso// de nas rnal 'byor gyis dbang phyug chen po de dang/ namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug thaMd yi rang par gyur to/ /kha sa mun dza namkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogso

item.tib: 'khor lo rdo rje
item.skttrans: tsakra badzra
item.coloph: 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogso// //phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang lo ts+tsha bas bcoso

item.tib: byang chub kyis sems rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: b+ho d+hi satwa rad+na tsakra tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems rien 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogso

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor pha'i rgyud
item.coloph: dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang bai ro'i 'gyur ro

item.tib: rdo rje seMda' namkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra satwa mahA A ka sha puSh+Ta nA ma yo gi ni tan+t+ra
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ namkha' che rgyas pa'i zhes bya ba ste/ manngagi snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud/ rdzogs pa'i yang rdzogs pa zab mo'i yang zab mo/ /shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don/ mthar thug pa namkha' che rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogso// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos pa'o

item.tib: rin po che 'khor lo brtsegs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na tsakra sir tsar tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rin po che 'khor lo rtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ mthun mong ma yin pa'i rgyud/ chen po rdzogs so// bi ma' la dang dpal rtsegs kyi 'gyur

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems nya mo bag la nyal/ bcoMdas kyi thugs kyi snying po
item.coloph: gsang ba'i don mdo rdzogs so// //bi ma' la dang bai ro'i bsgyur

item.tib: rin po che snang byed kyi rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na mahA b+hA hi tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: bi ma' la dang g.yu sgra'i 'gyur

item.tib: rma bya 'jing bsnol gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: kring kring ra tsa sa da na tan+t+ra bod+hi tsit+ta d+ham+ma nA ma
item.coloph: 'jam dpal dri ma med pa'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' ro langs bde ba la gdams pardzogso

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rma bya 'jing bsnol gyi rgyud las/ mtha'i mun sel chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi sa twa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha kring ra tsa tan+t+ra su tra a
item.coloph: rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po dang/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas re re'i mdzad pa so so'i don bstan pa'o// rdzogs so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po dpal gyi dpal chos chen po rmadu byung ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: rdzogs so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems/ rin chen bkod pa rnam par dbye ba'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA a ti d+harma tA bo d+hi tsit+ta rad+na byu hA bi b+he da tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems rin chen bkod pa rnam par dbye ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi' lendra mi ta dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba 'jing gsal 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rmadu byung ba/ byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka
item.coloph: da ni le'udi slob ma snod bzang po la lobs par bya ba'i gtan tshigs/ dbu las thun mang ma yin pa'i don brgyad kyis bstan te/ de yang gzhung las/ glang pos theg tshad khal bskur na/ /dud 'gro phal dang stobs mi mnyam/ /rtsal shugs 'di yang thun mong min/ /gangs kyis sengge'i gdangs phyung na/ /sder chags phal dang gdangs mi mnyam/ /gdangs skad 'di yang thun mong min/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs mthong na/ /chu phran phal dang rlabs minyam/ /chu rlung de yang thun mong min/ /ri rgyal lhun po'i rtser phyin na/ /ri phran phal dang 'phang minyam/ /rtse rgyal 'di yang thun mong min/ /mtha' gsal nyi zla 'di mthong na/ /gza' skar phal dang 'od mi mnyam/ 'od gsal 'di yang thun mong min/ /khyung chen gnam 'phang spyod mthong na/ /'dab chags phal dang shugsminyam/ /rtsal shugs 'di yang thun mong min/ /rdoe theg pa'i gting mthong na/ /theg chen phal dang gting minyam/ /gting dpag 'di yang thun mong min/ /shes rgyud sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa dang/ /thos pa chung ba'i blo sbram gnyis// 'gro ba'i don la don minyam/ /don mchog 'di yang thun mong min/ /rmadu byung ba rdzogso

item.tib: srogi 'byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: h+ri da yo da ya mahA tran+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: srogi 'byung ba ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhon nu bum pa'i zhabs kyis bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: dn+yA na gu h+ya ri bam rat+na u pa de sha tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta shrI sid+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas man ngag gi rgyud gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: rat+na tsakra nA ma tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na gu h+ya nA ma tan tra
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge 'od can dang/ bod kyi lo tsha ba pa gor bai ro tsa nas/ yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du/ zhus cing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsi t+ta a ti dz+nyA na sin+ta tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rin chen 'khor lo yais rdzogs pa'i rgyud don man ngag tu bya ba mthar /pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sid+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems/ kun la 'jug pa rnam dag ston pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA a ti d+harma bo d+hi tsit+ta sar+wa a da ba d+ha ra swa b+ha b+ha sha tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid byang chub kyi sems// kul 'jug pa rnam dag ston pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //pan chen bi ma dang g.yu sgra snying pos bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub sems rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra pra b+ha tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyudrdzogso// //paN+Di ta shrI sid+ha dang bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rin po che gdam ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na u pa de sha a gr+sha tra tsir lam tsakra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rin po che gdam ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ le'u bzhi pa rdzogs+ho// //bsam yas dpal gyi phug ring su// rje 'bangs gnyis kyi gnog ba'i chos so// rgyal ba thugs rgyud ma chad pa// gang zag snyan rgyud ma chad pa// cig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i don/ /mang ngag kun la ma grags pa/ /'khor lo'i rgyud 'grel man ngag bcas/ /gnya' na shes rab bdag la babs// e ma bdag nyid rtogs pa'i nyi ma shar// kun la yod na ngo mtshar med// des na kun las gsang ba'o/ re re las ma gtogs pa bka' rgya btab bo

item.tib: rin po che gdam ngag sna tshogs 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na pa tre sha ya g+ha a tsir yA /tsakra tan tra badzra ti nA ma
item.coloph: sprul pa'i rgyud phyi ma i thi'

item.tib: rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na Ar+ya pa tha da ri tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs+ho// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: chos thams cad kyi don bstan pa rdzogs chen thig le nyag gcig ye nas bya btsal bral ba
item.skttrans: d+harma sarba b+ha la a ta la
item.coloph: theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud/ 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi las/ /phul du phyung ba rdzogso// //dpal ldan sngags kyi bsrungs ma dang/ gter bdag ma ning nag pos bka' 'di bsungs cig/ gtad rgya/ sbas rgya/ gter rgya/ zab rgya/ bka' rgya/ gsang rgya/ gnyan rgya/ las can gcig dang phrad par shog /rdo rje gling pa'i gter ma'o

item.tib: rin po che srid pa bar do rang snang ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: rat+na si pa sha ya tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rin po che srid pa bar ma do snang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyud rdzogs sho

item.tib: lha ma yin g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: dE ba ma yin nan du ta tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: chos las 'das pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: ro bsregs thal ba nag po thams cad rdzogs par 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa du bi ha bi na ya tad da pat+na de wa sarba ka la
item.coloph: ro bsreg pa thal ba nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: lha rgyud rin chen spung pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: de wa rat+na mu la tan+t+ra
item.coloph: lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa 'khor ba dong sprugs gi rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ar+yA many+dzu shrI pa sha rat+na a pa ri tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: le'u bcu yis bstan pa'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs+ho// pan chen bi ma la dang gnyags lo dz+nyA na ku ma ra'i 'gyur ro

item.tib: 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa/ gsang sngags chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: many+dzu shrI b+hud tra sa ma ti ma hA gu ya man+t+ra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// dgongs pa ma nor de bzhino// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje yang// yul med 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// spyir na zhing khams gsum na yang// sku gsum rgyal ba'i zhing khams yin// chosku'i zhing khams rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i sa// longsku'i zhing khams mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gis/ /sprul sku'i zhing khams khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /gdul bya gsum yang de bzhin te/ /nyid las mi zhen sku lnga dang/ /seMda' sems ma'i sa dang ni/ /rigs drug du ma snang ba'o/ /de dag la yang gnyis yin te/ /sprul pa sku dang rang rgyud pa/ /rang rgyud 'khrul zhing 'khor ba ste/ /yan lag bcuis srid rtsa ston/ /rten 'brel 'khor lo bcuis 'chang/ /snang ba chen po gsal ba che/ /nor bu chen po rin chen tog /'od chen rnaMr snang bar byed/ /ye shes sku ste rang byung ba/ /seMn kun gyi yid ltar 'gyogs/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid la skyes/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston/ /de ltar 'khrul snang shar ba'o/ /de ni sprul sku'i zhing khams yin/ /chos sku'i zhing khams thugs kyi le'u bzhin/ /longs sku'i zhing khams sku'i le'u bzhin/ /thugs rdo rje dag pa'i byung tshul yang/ / sku yi 'od dang gsung gi 'od zer las byung/ /rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/ /sku gsum dri med thugs rje 'byung/ /chosku'i gnas lugs gong bzhin bstan/ /thugs rje rgyal ba'i rig pa ste/ /gong bshad bzhin du shes par bgyis//longsku'i thugs rjes sprul sku ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku sku yi rgyal/ /mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ /sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sangyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed//ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don bgyid pa/ /lha'i dbang po lha'i lha/ /lha'i bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi lha/ /'jom byed 'jom byed dbang phyag po/ /rdo rje seMda' / seMda' che/ /ston pa gcig po 'gro ba'i bla/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po/ /byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste/ /snying rje yi ni ya la dgod/ /sangyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dpaldan sangyas pad+ma skyes/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrungs rdzogsangyas/ /shes rab chen po skad cig la/ /chos kun khong du chud pa po/ /chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/ /rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal/ /rdo rje blo gros don chen byed/ /kun tu bzang po'i gtso bo ste/ /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo gsel/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa tho/ /rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod/ /chos kyi ghande sgra bo che/ /phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che/ /chos kyi dung de sgra chen ldan/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ /'gro na gdugs cing yangs pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ /gzugsu 'byin pa bla na med/ /nad do cog gi sgra che ba/ /sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing/ /'gro ba'i mar meyaisgron// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ /don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa//'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing/ /sems can kun yid yid dan ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa/ /seMn kun gyi yid la gnas/ /de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug /seMn kun yid tshim par byed/ /mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das/ /legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/ /bde sdug gsel ba'i mthar gyur pa/ /chags bra lus las 'das pa po/ /lus can kun las rnaMr grol/ /zhes gsungso// de nas lag na rdo rje sna drangs nas/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas pa ste/ /dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar/ /rdzogsangyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lag na rdo rje'i khro bo'i rgyal/ /sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu/ /gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ /mgon po bdag cag yi rango/ /legso legso legs par gsungs/ /de yis ngas dgongs zab mo'i don/ /rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal pa yis/ /'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni/ /bdag cag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro ba'i mgon po rjes yid rangs/ /cesgsungso// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse// gsung rab ma lus pa'i nyid khu// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa zhes bya ba// gter gyi snying po rdzogso// gu ru rin po che pad+ma dang ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: sku gsum gyi snang ba gsal bar ngo sprad pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ka ya tri a krA lo ka tan tra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogso

item.tib: dur khrod phung po 'bar ba man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ru tra ma tra m+ha tri tra bha ti a ti mi tra tan+t+ra pa la
item.coloph: dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i man ngag gi rgyud rdzogs+ho// //slob dpon bi ma' las mnga' bdag la gdams /pa/ / gzhan la bstan par gyur na// sgrol byed chen po'i snying khrag 'jibs// ces gsungso

item.tib: rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra ba ye ge du tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// slob dpon chen pos rje 'bangs grogs gsum la gdams pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje yangs rtog gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra ba ye ke tu h+ri da ya tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: gser la mthong sems mi bdog te/ /zong med lag tu gser mi 'khor/ /chos la mthong sems mi bdog te/ /snod med lag tu chos mi 'khor/ /don gyi snying po gsung rgyud 'di/ snying gi phug gtag tshig rgyud re/ /khong gi snying gton snying po rdo rje'i rgyud/ /yang rtse yang rtogs gdams pa'i ma bu rnams/ /snying gi snying gton snying po hu'M gi bskor/ /skal ldan skyo ngal med pa'i bu la gtod/ /kun gyi gzhi ma byed de nam mkhA khab mig 'dra/ sa ni gser gyi gzhi ma byed de rdo dang bshags mas bsgribs/ mig gis thams cad blta te rang ma mthong bas lan/ /snying po nyid dang rtag tu 'grogs te grub mthas bsgrib/ / e ma rang gis rang bslus rang ka snying re rje/ /shin tu dkon pa'i rin chen gser kyang byin pa'i sa rdo'o// //nor bu rin chen snying po ma bu gdams ngag rnams/ / /bzhag pa'i snod med sgro skur sgrib pa'i sa steng gsang/ ces pas pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ /namkha'i snying po la gdams nas/ lho nub kyi gling phran du gshegs so// //sarba mangga lam
rdo rje drag mos sras mo go ma de bi la gnang/ des pad+ma la'o/ /de'i rje 'bangs grogs gsum la gnang ngo

item.tib: dam tshig bkod pa sa gzhi'i rgyud rin po che spung pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: sa ma ya sa sa kradz+na tsa tur dzA rat+na d+ha tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: tshig gsum rgyud pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rgyud pa bar ma chad par/ dam tshig bkod pa sa gzhi'i rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: 'byung po kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: b+hu ta sarba da ma ka na nA ma tan+t+ra
item.coloph: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'byung po kun 'dul rgyud chen 'dir/ /thams cad ma lus 'dus pa yin/ /'di ni byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyud du zung/ /ces gsungso/ /ston pa kun tu bzang po la/ /rdo rje chos kyi blo gros rjesu yid rango/ /'byung po kun 'dul gyi rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogso

item.tib: lha rgyud rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: de wa a b+hi Shiny+ca rat+na tsa kra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogso

item.tib: rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i sku rin po che dbyigi sgron ma shes rab chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: badzra gu h+ya mahA kA ya rad+na b+ha le a kra ma su tra
item.coloph: de la zhu ba po dga' rab rdo rjes zhus te/ sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bsdud nas/ rin po che za ma tog mtshon gang ba'i nang du sbas nas/ 'gul khug tu bcug nas/ nyid kyi thugs dam rtse gcig par mdzado/ /rgyud lung man ngag grangs mang yang/ /bstan pa'i snying po yi ge lnga/ /thugs kyi gter du bcas pa yin/ /gcig las gnyisu ma spel gcig/ ces bka' sdigso/ na ra kan/ 'jam dpal rdo rje ye shes ngas/ /shri sing ha khyod la gtad/ /phyag rgya lnga yi dbyingsu sbas/ /rdo rje 'chang gis rgya yis btab/ / mkha'gro lnga yis mdud pa bkrol/ /'jam dpal rdo rje chos kyi 'gul khug ma/ /snod du mi sba rang gi lus la bcangs/ /yid la dran pa tsam gyis 'bras bu sngon sangs rgyas/ /chu srin pir gyi gre ba bzhin// srid pa 'khrugs kyang kha mi 'byung/ /bya brtsal med pa gsang ba rin po che dbyig gi sgron ma/ skad 'gyur bzhi pa rdzogso

item.tib: thig le kun gsal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ti la kA sarba kA la mahA tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: thig le kun gsal chen po zhes bya ba man ngag gi rgyud chen po tshegs bar dang 'bru la nges pa med par gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// //mig dang 'dra ba'i kun gsal 'di/ /gcig las nyung du ma zhug cig /gsum las mang du ma spel cig /rgyud pa'i bla ma'i zhal nas 'di skad gsungs/ /mig dang 'dra ba'i kun gsal 'di/ /cig las nyung du ma sba shig /gnyis las mang du ma spel shig /nga'i bka' las 'das pa na/ /sgrol byed chen po 'khor bcas kyis/ /srog rtsa chod cig /snying rtsa 'jibs/ ces dga' rab rdo rjes 'jam dpal bshes gnyen lagdamso// //de nas yang rim par gdamso/ /paN+Di ta dpal ldan seng ge'i 'od can dang lo tsa' ba chen po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: ye shes mar me'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na kA la tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: sgron ma rnam par bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzoD so/ / sngags kyi bsrungs mas bka'i bya ra gyis la srungs shig/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ ldang ma lhun rgyal gyi gter ma'o

item.tib: sangs rgyas ye shes sems dpa'i dgongs pa tshigs gsum pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sa ma tri na ya tri nA ma tan tra
item.coloph: rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyud la dgongs pa tshigs gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lag phrad du gtad pa rdzogso// //sngags kyi srung mas bka'i bya ra bgyis la bsrungs cig/ na ma mo khros ma/ mahA kA la/ rdo rje legs pa/ mkhA 'gro sde bzhi la gtad do/ srung shig/ dam med lag tu sho ra re/ thub par srung shig/ las 'phro can la byin cig/ gter bsrungs shin tu gnyan no/ /gter rgyas btab po/ /kha tham/ rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya/ kha tham/ gu hye/ i thi/ lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug gis/ mchad pa stag can du sbas/ lce sgom nag pos thon pa'o

item.tib: man ngag snying gi dgons pa rgyal ba'i dka' zhes pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: u pa tsit+ta dza ya sa ma ti tan tra na ma
item.coloph: bi ma' las nyang ting 'dzin bzang po la gnang ba gter nas ldang ma lhun rgyal gyis gdan drangs pa'o

item.tib: thig le kun 'dus chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ti la ka swa baM ta naM tra ma hA du nA ma
item.coloph: thig le kun 'dus chen po zhes bya ba le'u chen po bcu gnyis pa le phran zhe bdun pardzogso

item.tib: sku'i rgyud pad+ma 'khyil pa zhes bya ba/ u pra b+han many+dzu shrI sa man ta pra sa ra du pa nA ma mahA tan tri/ brgyud pa gsum pa'o
item.skttrans: kA ya tan+t+ra pad+ma kun Da li nA ma
item.coloph: sku'i rgyud pad ma 'khyil pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra ag gra bi ru tan tra
item.coloph: gsung gi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi ma' la dang/ lo ts+tsha ba ka lcog zhang gsum gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogso

item.tib: ye shes bla ma chen po'i rgyud
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na gu ru mahA tan tra
item.coloph: 'og min gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du/ sangs rgyas 'od bsrungs chen pos gsungs pa/ zhu ba po lag na rdo rjes zhus/ bsdud pa po dga' rab rdo rjes bsdus nas/ sa non pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi bzhi la rgyud ste/ 'jig rten du 'phelo/ /rgyud kyi snying po ye shes bla ma'i rgyud/ bskal pa thog ma med pa'i sngon rol nas/ /bskal pa bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i thugs nas thugs rgyud/ snyan nas snyan du bsgrags/ phyag nas phyag tu gtad de rgya yis gdab/ /rgya gar ngan sngags 'bru gsum 'phyong du btags/ /ra chod gzu lum byed pa'i slob ma la/ /sdig la mi 'dzem brnag pa'i las la sbyar/ / gu lang rin chen gser gyi rtag btsugs kyang/ /brnag pa'i ngan sngags 'bru gsum shor re skan/ /bi ma mi tra mkhas pa'i skye mchog khyed/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa rgyud bdun po/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi pho brang dbyingsu sbos/ /ces shrI sing has gsungs nas rgya yis btab po/ /rdzogs s+ho// //de nas bi ma' la mi tra bod du byon nas/ dbang bskur chos bshad nas/ rje 'bangs gnyis la bka' gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa nyung brgyud pa/ /rdo rje ldan gyi 'og nas seng ge ma smad dgu/ /stobs chung rnams kyis seng ge mi thub kyis/ /rgyal blon phyag tu gtad kyi shor ra re/ /rgyal po snyan khung chung ba dang/ /blon po gdug pa che ba dang/ /chos pa dam la mi gnas pas/ /thugs la chongs la gter du sbos/ ces gsungs nas/ slar gter du sbaso

item.tib: thig le gsang ba'i brda' rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ti la ka gu h+ye i ta na tan+t+ra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs+ho// // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi mA la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi sa twa d+h+wa tsha a gra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rgyud rdzogso

item.tib: rdo rje srin po rno ba rdo rje mchu can gyi rgyud zhes bya ba rgyud thams cad kyi snying po/ 'khor ba dong sprugs chen po'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra rak+Sha tsid+ha badzra mu ta ra tan+t+ra na ma ma
item.coloph: mkhas pa'i mkhas pa bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag la/ /dka' dang sdos nas don gyi man ngag btsal/ /rdo rje gdan nas shrI sid+has gnang/ /rang gi rgyud sbyangs 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pas ma nor rgyud/ /thugs kyi klong nas bcud gsum spros pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re'i don du bzhag/ rgyud kyi snying po man ngag gzer bzhi po/ /sde dang tshoms su bcad nas rgya yis btab/ /'chi med bdud rtsi thig le nyag gcigo /rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas bzhes pa 'di/ /rgyud rgyal rtsad po'i don du shrI sing has gnang bsku drin che/ /bod kyi chos lugs ngan pas slar gter du sbos/ zhes bi ma' la mi tras gdams pa rdzogso

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po thig le gsang ba de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA a ti tad ta gu he tan tra ti la ka na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po thig le gsang ba'i nges rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //mang+gA laM

item.tib: snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thig 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: b+ha ba sam pu ta/ a mri ta ra sa kha hi la/ saM pa ra a ti an ta tse da tan+t+ra na mA
item.coloph: snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi bcud thigs 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma'i phyi ma rdzogso// //oyan slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang bod kyi lo tsa ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyi bsgyur ba'o// lha sras khri srong lde btsan la btad nas rin po che'i gter du sbaso// gter rgya// sbas rgya// gtad rgya// sa ma ya// mnga' bdag nyang gi gter ma'o

item.tib: rin po che bcud kyi yang snying thog ma'i gras thag gcod pa spros pa gcod pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: rat+na sa u pa h+ri da ya A di an ta tshe da sra ba na tsa tsha da mu la tan tra
item.coloph: rin chen bcud kyi yang snying thog mtha'i gras thag gcod pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogso// // oyan mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsha ba rka ba dpal rtsegs bdag gis bsgyur te //mnga' bdag la gtad pa'o// gtad brgya sbas rgya/ gter rgya/ manga laM

item.tib: spros pa gcod pa sde lnga'i rgyud
item.skttrans: swa pany+tsa tshe da pany+tsha barga tan+t+ra
item.coloph: spros pa gcod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogso// //oyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// bod kyi lo tsa' ba ska ba dpal rtsegs kyis// bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po khri srong lde btsan la gdams/ sbel ba'i gnas med sa'i gter du sbas/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya

item.tib: rin po che bdud rtsi bcud thigs kyi rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rad na a mri ta ra sa kha si la tan tra na ma
item.coloph: rgyud thaMd kyi rgyal po// rin po che bdud rtsi bcud 'thigs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud rdzogso// //oyan gyi mkhas pa pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// bod kyi lo tsa ba ska ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ rgyal po khri srong lde btsan la gdams pa/ da lta spel ba'i gnas med sa'i gter du sbas/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ nyang gtero

item.tib: rin po che snang gsal spu gri 'bar bas 'khrul snang rtsad nas cod panamkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rad na dI ba tig+Sha na dzwa la ga sarba tshe da ga ga na an ta sa ma tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: rin po che snang gsal spu gri 'bar bas 'khrul snang rtsad nas gcod pa namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogso// //rgya gar gu ru pad+ma sam bha ba dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// //tshig la 'chal pa'i mi rnams ni// su zer nyan la blo sho rgod// man ngag gdeng du ma gyur par// tshig la don med smrad gi bsgom pa mkhan// man ngag zong du 'tsong pa'i bod ban la// spel ba'i gnas med sa'i gter du sbas// nam zhig bskal ldan cig dang 'phrad par shog/ bka' rgya/ zab rgya/ gter rgya

item.tib: rin po che spyi'i gnad skyon sel theg le kun gsal gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: rat+na sa ma n+ya mar ma do sa na bin du// sarba sra ka sa tan tra
item.coloph: rin po che spyi gnad skyon sel thig le kun gsal gyi rgyud le'u dgu pa rdzogso// // oyan gyi slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ lots+tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur nas// rgyal po khri srong sde'u btsan la gdams te/ rin po che gter du sbaso// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ gsang rgya'o

item.tib: gter snying po rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: su ra na d+ha na rang na ra swi tan tra
item.coloph: gter snying rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogso// // oyan pad+mas bshad cing lo tsa ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur nas/ rgyal po khri srong lde btsan la gdams pa'o// gter rgya/ zab rgya/ gtad rgya'o

item.tib: thig le ye shes bcud spungs sgron ma 'od 'bar gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: bin du dz+nyA na dra sa dri smri dzwa la tan tra
item.coloph: thig le ye shes bcud spungs sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogso// //oyan slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// lo tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur nas/ rgyal po khri song lde btsan la gdams pa// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ oM

item.tib: bdud rtsi bcud thigs sgron ma rtsegs pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: a mri ta ra sa me la da la kun rA tan tra
item.coloph: rgyud thams cad kyi rtse rgyal bdud rtsi bdud bsdus sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rdzogso// //oyan pad+mas bshad// lots+tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur/ rgyal po khri song lde btsan lagdamso// gter rgya/ zab rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya

item.tib: snying po bcud spungs namkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud
item.skttrans: h+ri da ras skan da ga ga na u da ra tan tra
item.coloph: snying po bcud spungs namkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud rdzogso// //oyan gu ru pad+mas bshad// lo tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing/ zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ khri srong lde btsan la gtad// spel ba'i gnas med pas// gter du sbas/ gter rgya/ zab rgya/ sbas rgya/ mnga' bdag nyang ral pa can gyi gter nas gdan drangs pa'o

item.tib: thugs kyi dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus pa// ka dag rnams kyi gsang don bcudu dril pa/ ma rig mun sel nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: tsi ta u pa h+ri da ya ta ra sa la raM pa ra gu h+ya ar thar/ sa pin du/ a bI d+ya d+ha ra sa sU rya tsan tra dzwa la tan tra
item.coloph: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thaMd kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa/ ka dag rnams kyi gsang don bcu dril pa// ma rig mun sel nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //oyan pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ lo tsa ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// //gter rgya// nyang ral pa can gyi gter ma'o

item.tib: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i bcud bsdus ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: bud d+ha sarba ma la thu la du na b+ha ri la kri hri tan+t+ra
item.coloph: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus ri bo rtsegs pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //slob dpon pad+ma dang ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// //mnga' bdag nyang gi gter ma'o

item.tib: dri med ka dag gi rgyud/ rin po che gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a ni ra ta dz+nyA na d+ha d+ha tan+t+ra rat+na ka lo ma hA nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po dri med ka dag gi rgyud rdzogso// // /gter gyi snying po dgongs pa'i zhe phugso

item.tib: rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi rgya mtshor 'khyil ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: tan+t+ra sarba rA dza sur+ya tsaN+t+ra h+ri da ya rasmi dzwa la a mri ta sa mu dra a
item.coloph: rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi rgya mtshor 'khyil ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogso// //bka' rgya/ gter rgya'o// oyan gu ru pad+ma yis// phyi ma ci 'byung da ltar shes// yongs rdzogs bla med 'byung ba'i dus// sku dang gsung gi bstan pa nub// thugs kyi bstan pa dar ba'i tshe// de dus yongs rdzogs thod rgal 'byung// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// dus ngan zer zhing spyod ngan byed// sde 'khrug nang rgyas chos 'khor 'joms// khrims zhig bod khams sil bur 'gro// pha spun nang thabs ngan 'gran byed// gos su khyi thul rnal 'byor mang// zong du chos 'tshong lag cha go// nyams myong glur len the tshom 'gengs// ma thub rnam gsum byung dus su// yongs rdzogs bla med theg pa 'byung// cesgsungso// u rgyan pad+mas bshad cing// ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur// rgyal po khri song lde'u btsan la gtad pa'o// gter rgya/ gtad rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya'o

item.tib: skye med ka dag zang ka'i rgyud
item.skttrans: a kra la kre sa ri tan+t+ra
item.coloph: skye med ka dag gi rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ti la ka du ha ka la tra du // ti la ka du ha ka la/ tan+t+ra mahA nA ma
item.coloph: tan+t+ra ra' dza ma ha'/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don gsal chen po'i rgyud mthong bas grol ba 'di// yongsu rdzogso// //slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //guhya/ gtad rgya rgya rgya/ ethi/ yang gsang ba'i man ngag gi rgyud chen po 'di sdud pa'i 'khor dga' rab rdo rjes sdus nas tshig dang yi ger bkod nas/ gu ru 'jam dpal bshes /gnyen la bshad// des gu ru shri sring ha la bshad des oyan gu ru pad+ma la bshad// oyan pad+ma 'byung gnas ngas/ snga brgya dus kyi snyig ma la/ ldan gsum skyes bu'i don ched du// chos rnams kun gyi ma chen mo// kun bskyed rang bzhung tshugs shing tshogs// spros bral don gsal rgyud chen sbas// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// thos bsam sgom la mi ltos shing// bstan pas rtogs shing dran pas gsal/ /'phrad pas dbang thob mthong bas grol// 'bras bu da ltar thob pa'i chos// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin// thugs gter yang gter gsang mdzod 'dis// ma tshang kha skong brul mtsho sdud// 'phrad thogs nyamsublangs mchog ma// snying nor yin no mig 'bras yin// bdag kyang thos chung ma yin te/ /rdo rje 'chang dang mkhyen rab mnyam// de phyir thugs kyi gsang gter 'di// gnam sa'i bar na gter cig ma'o// las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas kyang// bco lnga'i lo bar yid la brnag/ gsang dam dam bsrung dus thal tshe// 'khor ba blos btang des don 'tshol// bla ma la gus srog 'dor phod// gsum la dpe bstod kun la min// dus la babs nas 'gro don yang// snyan rgyud du thob nas skal ldan skyong// rgyud mchog bla med nub dgongs nas// rgyud 'di gter kha gsum du sbas// gcig ni byang gter pra dun tser// rnam snang thugs khar sbas te bzhag/ stag gi lo la 'byin par 'gyur// gcig ni yang gter 'dir sbas te// sbrul gyi lo la 'byin par 'gyur// gcig ni mkhA ri dgye ri phug// spre'u'i lo la 'byin par 'gyur// de yang 'dir ni ma bu tshang// yang gter rgyud gsum bu yi tshul// ci phyir ma'i bcud bsdud pa'o// don gsal rgyud mchog ma'i tshul// ci kun bskyed rang gzhung tshugs// de ltar zab phyir thugs gter yang// yang gter themsu 'di ma stan// de ltar sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// 'dis ston phyir na rgyud sor zhog// 'bres pa'i mon pes g.yog sa re// tig ka'i sbar mos bsdams sa re// lung drangs lto tshim bskus sa re/ /de phyir bka' rgyud rang sar zhog/ /don 'grol dka' na bla ma brten// tshogs brgya rtsa dang maN+Dala dbul// zhib tu dpe blta don la spyod// bltas pas grol ba kho na'o// shes rab blo ldan snying rtse can dang 'phrad par shog// //ci phyir gsang sngags ngo bo shes rab yin/ ithi / guhya/ rgya rgya rgya

item.tib: rgyud thams cad kyi rtse rgyal namkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: rA dza a ka sha ya dzwa la h+ri tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rgyud thams cad kyi rtse rgyal namkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// shrI radna badzra gyi bshad cing/ dpal he ru kas bsgyur ba'o// // las 'phro can dang phrad par shog/ rgya rgya rgya// //ye d+ha rma' he tu pra bha wa' he dun te Sha'nta thA ga to hya wa dat te Sha'nytsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM ba' di' mahA shra ma Na// yang gsang rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud// 'gyuro cog gi gleg bam rnams// rje btsun chen mos bzhengs pa'i dges// bstan 'gro yongs la bde legs shog

item.tib: rgyud thams cad kyi spyi phud nyi zla bkod pa nam mkhA dang mnyam pa'i / rgyud
item.skttrans: tan tra sarba tsu da sur+ya can dra b+hu ha ga ga na an tra sa ma tan tra
item.coloph: rgyud thams cad kyi spyi phud nyi zla bkod pa namkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyi bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// // gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya

item.tib: namkha' 'brug sgrog thog babs glog 'dus spyi rgyal 'phrul gyi rgya mdud kyi rgyud
item.skttrans: ga ga na ga ra dza ya da badzra ba Da i u d+ha ra me ma sa ma g+h+ya dza ya geM thi ta tan+t+ra
item.coloph: namkha'i 'brug sgrogs thog babs klong 'dus spyi rgyal chu srin nor bu 'phrul gyi brgya mdud kyi rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //u rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ lo tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur nas/ lha sras khri srong sde btsan la gdams pa/ rin po che'i gter du sbaso

item.tib: lta ba la shan chen po rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: d+hI Shi thi ta gra mahA rad na di pi mu la tan tra
item.coloph: lta ba la shan chen po rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //u rgyan gyi gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis mnga' bdag rgyal po'i don du bsgyur ba'o// //gtad rgya/ sbas rgya/ bha wantu/ shu bhaM// sarba mangalaM

item.tib: rtsa rlung thig le'i rgyud
item.coloph: 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud las bsdus pa rdzogs so

item.tib: yang ti gser gyi 'bru gcig pa snang byed spu gri'i rgyud
item.coloph: de la spyad pa'i yul med pas// ye bzhengs chen po zhes kyang bya// gzhi gzhag chen po zhes kyang bya// ye grol chen po ces kyang bya// yang tig nag /po zhes kyang bya// gser gyi 'bru cig ces kyang bya// thig le'i ngang las shar ba yi// thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud// srog gi thigs pa/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa/ snang byed spu gri'i rgyud rdzogso

item.tib: lta ba la thal gyi rgyud
item.coloph: yang gsang lta ba la thal gyi rgyud las// kun tu bzang po'i srog gi spu gri// rdoe sems dpa'i thugs kyi reg mchod// ro langs bde ba'i thugs kyi srog gi thig pa/ rgyud pa gsum pa/ lta ba la thal gyi rgyud rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: kun bzang srog gi thig pa 'bras bu ye grol chen po'i rgyud
item.coloph: kun tu bzang po'i srog gi thig pa// 'bras bu ye grol chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: yang ti nag po thig le mthong brtol gyi rgyud rig pa bcud byung gi brda' srog gi chan pa
item.coloph: thig le mthong brtol gyi rgyud// rig pa bcur 'byung gi brda'// srog gi 'chan pa/ yang ti nag po'i rgyud rdzogso

item.tib: yang ti nag po srog gi 'khor lo'i rgyud le med
item.coloph: srog gi 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po nyi zla 'od 'bar mkhA klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tan+t+ra rA dza sur+ya pra b+ha dzwa la a kar b+hyo ya shud d+ha tsa la tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: gu ru la bstan pa 'byung ba'i dus ji tsam na lags// zhus pas nga'i yang snying nyi zla 'di// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bstan pa nug/ gsang sngags thugs kyi bstan pa dar// lnga brgya dus kyi mtha' ma la// dus ngan zer zhing spyod ngan byed// rgya bod bye zhing rgyal khrims 'jig/ chos su rdzogs chen dar la ban de rnal 'byor dar// gos su re thul khyi thul dar la// lag cha dbyug pa mi mgo dar// da ltar sangs rgyas yin zer nyon mongs kha ma bri// zongs su chos 'tshong nyams myong glu ru len// spyod pa bab bcol kun klong tho cos 'gengs// man ngag grong skor rna ba rdzun gyis 'gengs// rnal 'byor zas nor 'dod phyir kha khar sprad te// rdzun ni ri khrod 'drims pa'i lad mo grong rgyu rnal 'byor byed// brtul zhugs gsang sngags spyod pa tho chos dgra bgegs 'gengs// de ltar byas pas tshe thung nad kyang mang// ma thub drag po 'byung po 'dus// bde gshegs byin rlabs ma thub dus// 'byung bas yi gser ma thub// mkhA 'gros bcol ba'i gter ma thub// skye 'grogs gtad pa'i blo mi thub// nyan thos 'dul ba'i khrims mi thub// btsun mos rang gi lus ma thub// rtsod pas 'dab rgyas byed dus su// pha spun nang rgyas byed pa'i dus// phyi yi so ga nang du zug/ lan cig de lta bu'i dus gcig mchis// ces gsungso// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkhA klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud chen// rdzogs pa chen po yang ti// u ryan gu ru pad+ma dang// lo tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal ma'i brag phug nang du sbas// mnga' bdag nyang ral pa can dang/ snye mo zhu yas gnod byin 'bar gyis gton// //gter rgya/ gsang rgya/ gtad rgya/ zab rgya/ ngo mtshar che'o// dge'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i rgyud/ lta ba thams cad kyi snying po rin po che rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: san ti mahA tar+ya tan tra/ 'bri thi sarba gar b+ha rad na mahA kra bi ta nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa las// lta ba thaMd kyi snying po rin po che rnam par bkod pa zhe bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang// bod kyi lo tsa ba a tsarya dran pa ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba rtsad gcod kyi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: sin+d+ha mahA rad++na ti brtsa tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba btsad gcod rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa// chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: sin+d+ha mahA tib ta tshe da d+harma kA ya// a ba gi ti tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang// de tshe 'dus pa rnaM bzhi la// rang seMs rtoD pa mngon 'gyur nas// dga' ba'i seMs kyi rang bzhin ste// rdoe seMdas don gsol pa// rtogs pa brjod pa'i don mthun pa// 'bras bu sangyas da lta myong// rang seMs ma ngang stugis phrad// de phyir da ltar kun bzang nyid// rdoe seMda' dga' ba che// 'dren mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de skad gsol ba'i don go nas// rdoe sems dpa' yang gsungs pa// sangyas thugs kyi byin brlabs las// dgos pa ma lus cud sdud pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs kyi don/ gdam ngag tshegs med nyid khu ni// dad ldan khyod la ngas bshad pa// don 'di rgyud la shin tu sbos// yang dag snying khu sems kyi bcud// thig le nyag cig mngon phyung ba// chos kyi gter gyi 'byung gnas 'di// snod ldan rnalyorrnams kyis kyang// gal te phyi rabs don ston na// sangyas chos skyong dbang du btsugs// gzhan la mi spel mna' bor nas// snod ldan man ngag 'chang bar bstan// tshoD kyi mchod pa ci nus bya// de ltar ma bcos chos bstan na// slob dpon tshe thung bar chod 'ong// bka' rku bla ma d+mod pa la// mi tshe 'di nyid da lta'i dus// nad dang kha yogs sn ogs 'ong// de phyir man ngag yang snying 'di// 'jig rten /grags pa nor 'dod phyir// don 'di ma spel sems la chongs// rdoe seMda'de skad gsungs// rdzoD pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa// chosku skye med rig pa'i rgyud las// rin po che gter gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rdzogs+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ a tsarya dran pa yais kyi rang 'gyur byas te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po sangyas thaMd kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don// rin po che yton kun 'byung gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: san+d+hi mahA bud d+ha sarba sa ma ti/ d+harmA kA ya e ka tad+ya wAka pri ka ra tan 'gu na mu ta la tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po sangyas thaMd kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don/ rin po che yton kun 'byung gi rgyud las/ d+harmma kA ya sid+ha pa ya/ gu ru te tsu dz+nyA na ke tu tsi ta sa ma ya gu hya rdzogso// // /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dran pa yais kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab nas/ mnyang tinge 'dzin la gdams

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying// sangyas thaMd kyi dgongs pa// namkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: sa ni mahA d+hi thi garba bud+ha sarba sa ma mi ti/ a kha g+ha su tra ta na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying rdzogs+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dran pa ye shes kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab nas/ /myang ting 'dzin bzang pos lcags sgrom nag po'i nang du/ /bram ze'i rgyud drug gdams pa dang bcas pa// bse sgrom smug por bcug nas/ /dbu ru bzong phug mo'i brag la mkhA 'gro ma rdo rje rgyan cig ma dang// badzra sa d+hu legs pa rtsal la btad nas gter du sbas pardzogso// // rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa//namkha' klongs yangs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ /gser gyi dril shing can 'di/ /dang po ngo bo nyid kyi skus/ /rgyal ba kun tu bzang po la bshad/ /des rdo rje sems dpa' la bshad/ /des dga' rab rdo rje la bshad/ /des bram ze bde mchog snying po la bshad// des shri sring ha la bshad// des bi ma' mi tra la bshad/ /des tinge 'dzin bzang po la bshad// der gter du sbas/ /'broM yais bla ma'i bu/ / 'brom ye shes snying pos gton nas// des myang shes rab mchog gi sras/ /des shangs kyi ston pa lce chung pa ye shes rgyal mtshan la bshad// des bla ma gnyen chung ba la nang ba'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po shin tu rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud// ye shes chos kyi sku// don 'dus rigs pa'i gsung// gsang ba thugs kyi ting 'dzin ni// rang 'byung bde ba'i 'khor lo// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i / rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: san+d+ha mahA a ti go ga bud+ha sar+b+ba da ya tan+t+ra /dz+nya na d+ha rmA kar+ya tha b+hin+da wa ka gu h+ya a tsit+ta sa ma ti/ a mu ka tsakra mi ta bur+d+ha tan+tr+a na ma
item.coloph: rdzogso// //bi ma' la dang dran ye'i 'gyur/ 'brom gyi gter ma'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po// rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: san d+hi ma hA sa pa shi ka garba ma su kha tsakra tan+t+ra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po rmad byung don gyi snying po rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud// gser gyi 'khrol shing can zhes bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang// bod kyi lo tsa ba gnyags dz+nya na ku ma ras sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //myang tinge 'dzin bzang po la bshad/ /des sras gter du man ngag dang bcas pa bcug/ mgon po nag po dang rdoe legs pa dang// rdoe brgyan cig ma la gtad// dbu ru gzo phug mo'i brag la sbas// 'brom yais snying pos gton nas// sras rgya mtsho la bshad// des sras yais seng ge la gtad// des rdog ston 'od 'bar la gtad// des rod pa gnyubs chung pa dang// myang ban rin chen gtsug tor la gtad pa'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po don 'dus pa'i rig pa'i gsung rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: san d+hi mahA' ar+tha bi da bArka a su kha tsakra /tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: gser gyis dril/ / bi ma' las myang la/ des gzor phug mor/ /gdam ngag 'di ye shes snying po la/ ston kyang de kas ston/ des myang dbang phyug rgya mtsho la/ des shangs pa la/ des gtsang gi bgrod ston la/ des ra ston la/ des byang chub rgyan la'o// //ith.i// // dge'o // // zhus dag

item.tib: rdo rje sems pa'i yi ge rgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra sa two a k+Sha ra bE pa sham pra ba rA dzA tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: le'u'i grangs ni nyi shu rgyad/ /dbu zhabs don ni gsum du 'dus/ / yang dag don gyi man ngag 'di/ /sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid la stas/ /u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur ro

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa'/ yi ge brgya pa'i rgyud/ thugs 'phrin las thaMd dam tshig gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra satwa sha ta tak+Sha ra rtsi karma sarba sa ma ya tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: de nas ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// //'khor du 'dus sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i lha tshogs rnams dang/ /yang phur bdud rtsi ma gshin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la/ /tshangs pa dang brgya sbyin dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba dang/ thugs bzangs ris dang/ /sde brgyad dang/ phyogs skyong ba bcu dang/ rdo rje drag po la sogs te/ /mkhA 'gro ma rnams dang/ lag na rdo rje yi rang ste / mngon par bstod pas bstod do/ /thugs rtse gcig pa'i badzra pa' nis bsdus te/ / sprul sku pad+ma 'byung gnas la gtad pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa'i thugs phrin las thams cad dam tshig gi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //sprul sku pad ma 'byung gnas dang / dge slong nam mkha'i snying po'i bsgyur ba/ /rje 'bangs grogs gsum la gdams pa'o/ /rgyud 'di dbang mchog rgyud kyi kha bskongs pa'i rgyud do// // gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ sarba mangga laM// //gsang ba'i yang gsang rdzogs chen bka' gter gyi/ /rgyud kyi glegs bam lha gcig rnal 'byor ma/ /'gyur med chos 'dzin thugs dgongs dag pas bzhengs/ /dge bas bstan pa rgyas sogs rgyu sbyor gyi/ /rnam dag bzhedon kun 'grub bkra shis shog

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying / kun tu bzang po/ ye shes klong gi rgyud/ rin po che gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: sing+n+ha mahA tad d+ya dAr+tha gar b+hi / sa man+ta b+ha dz+nyA na gra ha tan+t+ra rad na su bar+Na nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po ye shes klong gi rgyud zhes bya ba// nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying zhes kyang bya/ /rin po che gser gyi yang zhun zhes kyang bya/ /thugs kyi nying khu zhes kyang bya/ /rin po che gser gyi 'dril shing can zhes kyang bya ba 'di rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tras/ /bod du bsnams nas byon te// myang ting nge 'dzin la bstan pa'o// des dbu ru bzod phug mo'i brag la sbas nas// 'brom ye shes bla ma'i snying pos gton nas/ myang dbang phyug rgya mtsho la bshad// des myang shes rab mchog la bshad/ /des shangs pa lce chung pa la bshad do

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: sin+ng+ha mahA sa man+ta b+ha dra/ dz+nyA na ye tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa cig tu dril ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // gu ru shrI sing ha pra bha dang gnub sangs rgyas ye shes kyi bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA sin+ng+hA dz+nyA na b+ha sa man+ta/ dz+nyA na pra b+ha di sha ut+ta tan+t+ra na ma
item.coloph: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bka' dgros pa'i rgyud/ kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba rdzogso

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: san ti mahA sa man ta b+ha da tsi ta g+hu he na ma tan tra
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon shrI sid+ha pra ha ta dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnubs yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgyud 'di yang dben du mahA ka la la bka' bsrungs gtad de/ sbas nas yon tan rgya mtsho skye ba bdun pa cig dang phrad de/ /bstan pa'i snying po 'dzugs par gyur cig

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i phyi ma gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: san ti mahA sa man+ta b+ha dra bi ta gu h+ye nA ma tan tra
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu ru shri sing ha dang/ lo ts+tsha ba rdo rje yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: san ti mahA sa man ta b+ha tra dz+nyA na bi ta gu he nA ma tan tra
item.coloph: mthar thug pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogso

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes namkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud/ lta sgom thams cad kyi snying po/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: san d+hi mahA ta r+ya sarba du tha/ dz+nyA na a kha sa man tan tra / driSh+Ta sa mA d+hi sarba gar+b+he/ mahA rad+na bi byu hA nA ma
item.coloph: chos dang theg pa thams cad kyi yang rtse// lta ba thams /cad kyi me long// sgom pa thams cad kyi 'bral med// spyod pa thams cad kyi la zlo// dam tshig thams cad kyi bsrung mtshams// 'bras bu thams cad kyi se snying// theg pa thams cad kyi zil gnon// shes rab can gyi rgyang shing// d+man pa rnams skrag par byed pa ye shes namkha' dang mnyam pa'i spyi rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po ma rig mun pa rab tu sel bar byed pa'i lta ba // ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: san d+hi mahA mu hi pra dI pa ka ri driSh+Ta dz+nya na gi ti san d+hi tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po ma rig mun pa sel bar byed pa'i lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud rin po che dngul gyi dril shing can 'di rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba a tsarya dran pa'i ye shes kyi skad dang rgyud kyis// bsgyur nas gtan la phab nas// nyang ting 'dzin bzang pos lcags sgrom nag po'i nang du// gse sgrom smug por bcug ste// dbu ru gzung phug mo'i brag phug tu// mkha'gro ma rdo rje brgyan gcig ma dang// badzra sa d+hu legs par brtsal la gtad nas sbas pa// 'brom ye shes snying pos gton nas// nyang dbang phyug rgya mtsho la gtad pa'o// des shangs pa lce chung pa ye shes la gtad pa lagso

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: san+ti mahA d+h+ri ti sarba garbe tan tra nA ma
item.coloph: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa rdzogs pa chen po mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje man ngag// lta ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rgyud rin po che bkod pa'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs+ho// //bi ma la dang gnyags dz+nyA nas bu tshal gser khang gling du bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na tsakra tan tra
item.coloph: rdzogso
thig le mthong brtol gyi rgyud// rig pa bcur 'byung gi brda'// srog gi 'chan pa/ yang ti nag po'i rgyud rdzogso// gleD bam 'di la thig le mthong rtol gyi rgyud 'di lhag po bzhugs pa yin

item.tib: rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: san+ti mahA dz+nyA na tsakra guh+ya tsit+ta tan+t+ra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo// gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogso

item.tib: 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: shrI many+dzu tan+t+ra du
item.coloph: yang ti nag po 'bras gcig pa// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa'i rgyud rdzogso

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pa lo gir ti sho ra sa ma ti e ka tan+t+ra na ma
item.coloph: rtse gcig gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so

item.tib: rin po che 'byung bar byed pa sgra thal 'gyur chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: swa ba ta d+ha tra ma hA rad na ka ra ta tra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs so/ /gsang ngo/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di ni / 'gro ba khyad par las ma rtogs pa / su dga' dga' las yod pa ma yin no / dpal sngags bsrungs kyi rgyal mo smug nag khros pa'i rgyal mo ra gdong mas bsrungs cig / sa ma ya'/ so phag a thim/ /snod med dag la mi sbyin pas sba bar bya / gal te byin na mkha'gros chad pa chod

item.tib: bkra shis mdzes ldan chen po'i rgyud / dpal namkha' chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA swa ta ban a pra maM shri tan tra ma na ma
item.coloph: bkra shis mdzes ldan namkha' med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogso/ / rgya rgya rgya/ zab rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ dpal sngags bsrungs kyi rgyal mo e ka dza tis bsrungs cig

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra satwa d+he ke tsit+ta tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: de nas mkhA 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gdams so/ rgyud 'di'i me lce bya'o/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyi gshed ma bya'o / zhes gdams so/ nga rgyal gyi sgra 'di skad ces bsgragso/ rag mo sa ma ya snying phyung bhyo bhyo/ ces brjod nas mi snang ba'i ngang du gshegso/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i bu log rtog sel byed la sogs te/ thub pa chen po drug dang / mi ma yin gyi 'khor rnams rjesu yi rang ngo/ ces rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud ces bya ba / yang gsang yang gab sbas pa'i rgyud / rdzogs pa chen po gtan la 'bebs pa / gzhonu dpa' bo stobs ldan gyis dur khrod me ris 'bar bar gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams la rang rang gi rigs dngos su bstan pa'i bka' dam pas / gsang ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so/ / rgya rgya rgya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' sgra don gyi man ngag tu bshad pa'o/ de bzhin du sgra las thabs kyi yan lag 'byung bar bstan pa'o/ sngags kyi gtan tshiD rgyas par bstan pa'o rdzogso/ /phugs mi lnga gter nas 'og gis / srid pa'i bu nyi ma spyan gyi byar gyis shig / ma phugs na yang gzhu khod la mnga' rgyob cig / des mi srid mi srid do / des nas mkhar nyi ma can du bros shig / de sgeg mo me long can gyis me long bltos shig / mkhar la bdag thogs shig /mkhar la 'obs lnga rims kyis bkor cig / mi lnga go chos cig / su nye ba thams cad sod la thong shig / rin po che'i rta lnga 'brog la yan du thong cig / rang gi yul la sa bcad cher gyis shig / sgeg mo me long can yangs pa can du / lha'i bu mdzes ldan chen po la bag mar thong cig / bu sa 'dzin du chu gcig / de ltar byas na rgyal srid zin du 'ong / ces don gyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas / rig pa kha yan du gtong ba'i man ngag / snang ba ye shes kyi grogsu 'char ba'i man ngag / brda yi rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob pa'i man ngag / yang nas yang du sbas pa'i gsang ba yang khol du phyung ba / gang zag dbang po 'bring cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangyas thob par byed pa'i cha rkyen man ngag / rin po che ze ba bcwo lnga pa / ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa rdzogso/ / rgya rgya rgya

item.tib: kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me long gi rgyud zhes bya ba thams cad ston pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sa man d+ha tsi ta d+he ka tan tra na ma / sarba da na tan tra / A / sa man ta tsi ta d+he ka tan tra na sarba d+ha na tan a pa sha ni tri
item.coloph: ces kun tu bzang po rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po thugs kyi me long gi rgyud zhes bya ba / don thams cad gsal bar byed pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ /ithi / rgya rgya rgya / rgya gsum gyis ma btab sha ra re / sngags kyi bsrungs ma e ka tsa ti mas bka' 'di'i bya ra gyis shig / rag mo khrem myags bhyo / rag mo dung thing bhyo / rag mo har hur snying rtsal bhyo / ma ma ru ru dri spa srog la bhyo bhyo / byas shing gos nag brdabs na rtags mod la 'ong ngo / thig le gsang bskor gi man ngag 'di ni / bi ma las sgra mi 'thun pa gsum las bsgyur ba lags so / byang chub sems dpa' khri srong lde btsan gyi thugs dam gsang ba yang khol du phyung ba lagso/ zha mgon srag zan gyis bsrungs cig / ging ka ra ging ka ra srog rtsal hur thums bhyo / dza hu'M baM ho / snying khrag bzhibs bzhibs/dza/ ces sgra 'byung ba'i dus su brjod cing bsob brdabs na rtags dngos su 'ong / rgya rgya rgya / /kha thaM kha thaM kha tham

item.tib: ngo sprod rin po che spras pa zhing khams bstan pa'i rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rad na pra ba yo ga sa hu li / tan tra na ma
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas / gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag rab tu dga' mgu yid rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do/ gsang ba'i ngo sprod rin po che spras pa'i rgyud ces bya ba / rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud du bstan pa rdzogso/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ka dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: tsit+ta sarba lo ka rad na tan tra na ma
item.coloph: de skad ces sems med pa'i rig pas bka' stsal pas / rig pa rdo rje gnon po la sogs pa dang / rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs gsum gyi khro bo dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mkha'gro ma dpag tu med pa dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do / mu tig phreng ba rin po che'i rgyud zhes bya ba / rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud / 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las khyad par du phyung ba rdzogso

item.tib: kun tu bzang po klong drug pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: sarba b+ha la su tra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: de nas ston pa kun bzang gis/ tshig gi mtha' bsdud 'di skad gsungs/ e ma ngo mtshar smad du byung/ lha rnams 'bros khungs cad pa'i phyir/ nga ni lha min kun gyi gtso/ byol song 'bros khung stan pa'i phyir/ da ni byol song rnam kyi sgron/ yi dwags 'gros khung bcad pa'i phyir/ /nga ni yi dwags kun gyi gter/ d+myal ba'i 'gros khung rgyun bcad phyir/ nga ni d+myal ba'i rgyal por snang/ de ltar ston pa kun bzang gis/ rig drug 'gros pa'i khungs bcad pas/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ dga' mgu rang pa'i sems skyes nas/ ston pa nyid la rab bstod/ de ltar gsum la rje yi rang/ ces kun tu bzang po klong drug pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'gro ba rig drug gi skye gnas dag par byed pa/ rang bzhin rdzog pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud byung ba rdzogs so

item.tib: gser gyi me rtog mdzes pa rin po che'i sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pu tsa si na gi ta rat+na a lo ke dzwa la tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: de skad ston pas gsungs pa yis/ rgyud bdag rdo rje 'chang las so/ dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems bskyed nas/ 'di nyid gsung la mngon par bstod/ rgyud 'di so sor bzung ba yis/ yon tan bsam med chen po thob/ gser gyi me rtog mdzes pa rin po che sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba/ 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud phyung ba rdzogs so/ /rgya rgya rgya/ sa ma ya/ ithi/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mi la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba ka dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyor ba chen po gsang ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA su r+ya tsan tra g+hu na g+hu ya tan tra nA ma
